Reviews.Title: “A true gem, close to all major attractions and Dodgers !”
Reviews.Author: Ronald_1971
Reviews.Content: visit super 8 downtown los angeles experience 15 ago earlier review stayed 4 nights enjoy city angels dodgers games im happy hotel kept reputation maintaining attractive rates discount rate super 8 site staying 3 nights clean beds comfy friendly frontdesk led darlene welcome smile helpful breakfast included rate sufficient choice bread cereal pastry coffee juice fruit complimentary site parking plus la included neighbourhood improved choice bars clubs thai restaurant nearby burger king glendale believe sunset late completely safe biggest assets baseball fan dodgers stadium 10 mins walking distance youre close downtown griffith park hollywood super 8 motel ive experienced choice trip la wont class rates offer

Reviews.Title: “good value - nice and very helpfull staff !!!”
Reviews.Author: Josef R
Reviews.Content: super8 downtown la real stay vaction southern ca security quiet clean wifi breakfast motels choices staff real gem darlene front desk helpfull didn´t nice lady frontdesk else motelshotels hanks nice front desk sorry forgot name definitley recommend motel super8 motels

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel and close to Dodgers stadium !”
Reviews.Author: Ronald_1971
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 days super 8 downtown excellent location visit dodgers baseball stadium pubs nearby don´t understand people bad neighboorhood walked streets late completely safe sufficient parking available hotel convenient location tour city angels breakfast choice limited acceptable i´ll returning la booked hotel hope add choice breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel if your passing thru..”

Reviews.Content: super 8 hotel pretty nice microwaves fridges coffee pots included rate free parking free internet free breakfast location dodgers stadium walked chinatown dinner front desk staff freindly accomadating

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable, but nothing around.”

Reviews.Content: experience super 8 impression super 8 class below western wrong hotel perfect basic nice welcoming lobby friendly staff clean size coffeemaker fridge microwave tv channels floor ice machine vending machines drinks snacks street supermarkets name grocery stores found immediate price including internet breakfast parking huge plus breakfast basic cereal milk juice apples coffee tea enjoyed stay nice atmosphere hotel stayed dragon gate western super 8 simular pricing compare 2 strictly hotel equally nice location dragon gate western super 8 bit sunset blvd doesnt offer restaurants shops basically close car course car minor super 8 25 minute walk union station catch bus 2 4 bus stop bus stop hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not exactly convenient for seeing the LA sights!”
Reviews.Author: evapor8
Reviews.Content: hindsight wonderful sometimes handy booked super 8 2 nights price reasonable cheap reasonable hotel 30 mins busmetro trip pretty rough hollywood whilst stock photo building makes look ok pretty tatty inside beds comfortable people manning front desk mixture helpful downright rude cheapish stop night whilst driving consider staying plenty base limited sights la

Reviews.Title: “Well located good value”
Reviews.Author: anhemp
Reviews.Content: hotel positioned considering hire car free parking reasons stayed close proximity dodgers stadium meant walk game reception nice clean staff friendly typical super 8 stay

Reviews.Title: “Would highly recommend for money conscious travellers!”
Reviews.Author: Cherrykim
Reviews.Content: finished week tour california perfect enjoy walk theres plenty shops sunset towards hollywood boulevard etc easy la food bars nearby situated front hotel didnt noisy continental breakfast ones youre quick snack day ideal service clean fridge microwave vending machine outside yep recommend

Reviews.Title: “A great deal!”
Reviews.Author: abbydab
Reviews.Content: located sunset blvd near silver lake easy parking free breakfast abundant hotel spotless staff friendly hotel maintains additional security resetting door locks daily bathroom adequate space guests stay visit la

Reviews.Title: “Clean, kind, well-situated”

Reviews.Content: traveled 19month time nervous naught hotel request nonsmoking situated quietest building clean newlyrenovated quiet minifridge coffeemaker adds comfort buy groceries fastfood stores nearby laundromat street public transportation line close pharmacies park echo park little sunset blvd strip lined cafes diners restaurants shops staff friendly courteous budget traveler family definitely stay la

Reviews.Content: chose hotel based reviews read location cleanliness friendly staff found true five minute drive garment district bonaventure walt disney concert hall clean beds comfortable staff friendly frills decent price downtown la front hotel busy noisy intersection trucks motorcycles night wore earplugs hear traffic noise stay hotel hear noise staying front

Reviews.Title: “great hotel, decent location”
Reviews.Author: kellcc
Reviews.Content: visited la music festival looking nice hotel meeting budget particular super 8 perfect staff friendly helpful clean nice condition close proximity echo park historic park etc continential breakfast wasnt extraordinary expect coffee juices cereal danishes highly recommend hotel staying couple nights looking luxury resort stay pleased
